statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT location, vehicle_count FROM traffic_patterns WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM traffic_patterns WHERE vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level = 'High' ORDER BY vehicle_count ASC;
SELECT location, timestamp, vehicle_count FROM traffic_patterns WHERE location LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT location, vehicle_count FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level='High' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level='Low' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, location, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level='Medium' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT location, vehicle_count, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE vehicle_count < 50 ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level > 5;
SELECT intersection_id, congestion_level, timestamp FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_flow < 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, emission_rate, vehicle_type FROM emissions_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'car';
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, emission_rate, timestamp FROM emissions_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT intersection_id, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level > 5 AND traffic_flow > 50 ORDER BY congestion_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY emission_rate ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM emissions_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT intersection_id, congestion_level, traffic_flow FROM traffic_patterns JOIN emissions_data ON traffic_patterns.intersection_id = emissions_data.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM TrafficPatterns;
SELECT location_name, traffic_volume FROM TrafficPatterns ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM CongestionData WHERE congestion_cause = 'Accident';
SELECT location_id, congestion_level FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE congestion_level LIKE '%High%';
SELECT location_id, SUM(co2_reduction) AS total_reduction FROM EmissionReduction GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM TrafficPatterns ORDER BY location_name DESC, traffic_volume ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, congestion_level FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT congestion_cause, congestion_time FROM CongestionData WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY congestion_time ASC;
SELECT location_name, co2_reduction FROM TrafficPatterns JOIN EmissionReduction ON TrafficPatterns.location_id = EmissionReduction.location_id;
SELECT * FROM CongestionData JOIN TrafficPatterns ON CongestionData.location_id = TrafficPatterns.location_id WHERE congestion_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY congestion_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, traffic_volume FROM traffic_patterns WHERE congestion_level = 'High';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT SUM(traffic_volume) AS total_traffic_volume FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT location, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY congestion_level;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC, traffic_volume ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, traffic_volume FROM traffic_patterns WHERE location = 'City Center' ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT timestamp, location, vehicle_count FROM transportation_flows WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC, vehicle_count DESC;
SELECT AVG(traffic_volume) AS average_traffic_volume, congestion_level FROM traffic_patterns GROUP BY congestion_level;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM emissions_data WHERE greenhouse_gas_emissions > 50;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT id, location, signal_type, signal_status FROM traffic_signals ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, signal_type FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_status = 'GREEN';
SELECT id, location, signal_type FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_status = 'RED' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, signal_status FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_type = 'PEDESTRIAN';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_type, location, speed_mph FROM traffic_data WHERE speed_mph > 50 ORDER BY speed_mph DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT location, congestion_level, weather_conditions FROM congestion_data WHERE congestion_level > 3 AND weather_conditions = 'Rainy' ORDER BY congestion_level ASC;
SELECT vehicle_type, AVG(avg_speed_mph) AS average_speed FROM traffic_analysis GROUP BY vehicle_type ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
